IVisualizationClient.GetIPv4Address (METH)
IVisualizationClient.GetIPv4Address (METH)
Â¶
METHOD GetIPv4Address : STRING
Returns the IPv4 address of the given client in dotted notation if provided by the
client which is typically only done for webvisualizations.
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Comment
Return
GetIPv4Address

Output

TRUE
: The ip address is valid
